text: As with publications on bats , research effort on bat - associated viruses is heavily skewed towards the United States , a country with a nationwide surveillance program for monitoring and reporting of Figure 3 . Research effort on bats by country . The research effort was quantified as the number of publications indexed in PubMed that included the search terms ( " bat " OR " bats " OR " Chiroptera " ) by country . Raw data provided in Table S4 .
